Text: BOZX can you please tell me where in the world Mission to Mars is out on Blu-Ray. I wanna own this disc NOW. I'm one of the very few people who really love this film. So please give me some info so that i can order it for my collection.

dr^GonZo:

You can buy this in France, amazon.fr for example.

I'm surprised to see such a comment here, especially for this movie, but am too a fan of this film, and actually wondered where it was released on BD. 
Gona go order one as well! 
Oh, and they say piracy hurts sales. I think I buy more DVDs and BDs than the average non-pirating individual, heh.
